channel.title: Update Command

item.title: Update Command
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

Hi,

I have a PI based server and I’m looking for a Update command which will let my server disconnect automatically after the count down with a time duration I pick but more importantly it has to save everyone’s files in-game.

I already had this in my source but I either type in the wrong command or it just doesn’t work:

[code=java] {

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("owner unique")) {
			String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
			int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a;
			PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
			PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
			PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
		}

[/code]

Any solutions? Maybe I use the wrong command? Maybe you know how to make the right one? Anything is helpful!

Read full topic
